name: Drop-in: Little Hands Creative Art
description: Let's experiment with different textures and materials to explore, express and create with paper, paint and crayons. Sign ups start at 9:30am for either a 10:00am,10:30am or 11:00am slot. - Space is limited. - Adults must be present to sign up for a time slot.

howToGetIt: If this is a Drop-In program, please go to the meeting location at the activity start time.
